title: Christmas around the world
brief_description: Observe different holiday customs as we travel around the world. Enjoy the holiday carols of Austria, an old-fashioned German Christmas with fairs and foods, the simple charms of a French provincial Christmas and a typical American Christmas full of warmth and good cheer.
